SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.CustomerID , AA.BusinessID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate
, BB.BizNo , BB.BizName , BB.RepName
FROM dbo.BMCustomerBusiness AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.BMBusiness BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BusinessID = BB.ID WHERE AA.CustomerID = #CustomerID# ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.CustomerID , AA.BusinessID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate
FROM dbo.BMCustomerBusiness AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.BMCustomerBusiness ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, CustomerID, BusinessID, StartDate, EndDate ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #CustomerID#, #BusinessID#, #StartDate#, #EndDate# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.BMCustomerBusiness SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, CustomerID = #CustomerID# , BusinessID = #BusinessID# , StartDate = #StartDate# , EndDate = #EndDate# WHERE ID = #ID#
statements.select:
SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.CustomerID , AA.BusinessID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate
FROM dbo.BMCustomerBusiness AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.CustomerID = #CustomerID# AND AA.StartDate = #StartDate#

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.CustomerID , AA.BusinessID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate
FROM dbo.BMCustomerBusiness AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.CustomerID = #CustomerID# AND AA.StartDate = ( SELECT MAX(StartDate) FROM DBO.BMCustomerBusiness WHERE CustomerID = #CustomerID# AND StartDate < #StartDate# )

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.CustomerID , AA.BusinessID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate
FROM dbo.BMCustomerBusiness AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.CustomerID = #CustomerID# AND AA.StartDate = ( SELECT MIN(StartDate) FROM DBO.BMCustomerBusiness WHERE CustomerID = #CustomerID# AND StartDate > #StartDate# )
